statements.select: SELECT COUNT(T1.APN_ID) FROM BS_AutoPartsName T1 WHERE T1.APN_IsValid = 1 AND T1.APN_Name = #WHERE_APN_Name# AND T1.APN_ID != #WHERE_APN_ID#

DECLARE @RecordCount INT SELECT @RecordCount = COUNT(T1.APN_ID) FROM BS_AutoPartsName T1 LEFT JOIN BS_AutoPartsType T2 ON T2.APT_ID = T1.APN_APT_ID
T1.APN_Name LIKE '%'+#WHERE_APN_Name#+'%'
T1.APN_APT_ID LIKE '%'+#WHERE_APN_APT_ID#+'%'
T1.APN_IsValid=#WHERE_APN_IsValid#
SELECT @RecordCount 'RecordCount', T1.APN_ID, T1.APN_Name, T1.APN_Alias, T1.APN_NameSpellCode, T1.APN_AliasSpellCode, T1.APN_APT_ID, T2.APT_Name, T1.APN_SlackDays, T1.APN_UOM, T1.APN_FixUOM, T1.APN_IsValid, T1.APN_CreatedBy, T1.APN_CreatedTime, T1.APN_UpdatedBy, T1.APN_UpdatedTime, T1.APN_VersionNo FROM BS_AutoPartsName T1 LEFT JOIN BS_AutoPartsType T2 ON T2.APT_ID = T1.APN_APT_ID
T1.APN_Name LIKE '%'+#WHERE_APN_Name#+'%'
T1.APN_APT_ID LIKE '%'+#WHERE_APN_APT_ID#+'%'
T1.APN_IsValid=#WHERE_APN_IsValid#
ORDER BY T1.APN_UpdatedTime DESC
OFFSET ( #PageIndex# - 1 ) * #PageSize# ROWS FETCH NEXT #PageSize# ROWS ONLY
SELECT DISTINCT T1.APA_Name FROM BS_AutoPartsArchive T1 WHERE T1.APA_IsValid = 1 AND ISNULL(T1.APA_Name, '') != '' AND #value# LIKE '%' + T1.APA_Name + ';%'
